overview: Vlogger and body-positive internet queen Grace Victory tries clean eating on for size. Is this the lifestyle change we all need, or another fad diet in disguise - a fad diet with potentially dangerous consequences?  Clean eating has exploded - from quinoa to courgetti, smoothie bowls to sweet potato brownies. Never before have we been so concerned with the purity of our food.  Lighting the way are a team of 'glowing' wellness bloggers. The goddesses of green juice have come to deliver us from the evils of our dirty, processed and sugar-filled diets.  With food avoidance now officially a mainstream phenomenon, cutting out gluten, sugar and dairy has become second nature to many. But is this new wave of 'health-conscious' poster girls really promoting the best way to eat, or are the pretty pictures hiding an uglier truth?
tagline: Vlogger and body-positive internet queen Grace Victory investigates clean eating. Is it the lifestyle change everyone needs, or is it another fad diet in disguise?
title: Clean Eating's Dirty Secrets
